entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
